mapper.select: SELECT etf_id AS etfId, base_date AS baseDate, stock_code AS stockCode, stock_name AS stockName, holding_qty AS holdingQty, current_price AS currentPrice, eval_amount AS evalAmount, weight_ratio AS weightRatio, last_update AS lastUpdate FROM kodex_etf_holdings WHERE etf_id = #{etfId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN weight_ratio IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ASC, weight_ratio DESC
SELECT DISTINCT etf_id FROM kodex_etf_holdings WHERE LOWER(stock_code) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%') OR LOWER(stock_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keyword}), '%')
